item.title: Mexican restaurant bankruptcy trend should alarm consumers
item.description: A lot of Mexican chains have filed for Chapter 11 protection, and if that trend continues, it could leave consumers with fewer dining choices.

item.title: Las Vegas Strip adds huge new casino project
item.description: Many Las Vegas Strip project have stalled or remained rumors, but one huge project is moving forward.

item.title: Cathie Wood makes surprising deeper bet on robotaxis
item.description: These trades may reveal Wood's next big conviction.

item.title: Amazon's bestselling Yankee Candle with a seasonal scent is on sale for just $15
item.description: The fall scent "makes the whole house feel cozy."

item.title: US government warns travelers police 'will use weapons'
item.description: The travel advisory warns of protests and a "move to a restoration of public order."
